advertisingCookiesInfo: Advertising cookies gather informations from you on your device to display advertisements based on topics that might interest you. There are no ads on the site currently, so you cant enable these cookies.
analyticalCookiesInfo: Analytical cookies allow us to track users, so we can see how many users and how they are using our website at the moment. This will help us to improve the user interface of our website, so that everyone can easily find what they are looking for.
chooseFormat: Please select, which format would you like to receive your stored personal datas in. After choosing the right format, please click on the request data button, thereafter you will receive a download link to your email address.
confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete?
cookieConsentInfoStart: The website uses cookies and similar technologies to display content, make the website fully functional, and enhance the user experience. You can read more in our
deleteProfileConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your profile?
deleteProfileInfo: If you continue, then all of your data, including your personalized settings will be deleted and can not be restored later.
deviceAlreadyTrustworthy: You already marked this device as trustworthy
deviceMarkedTrustworthy: The device has been marked as trustworthy
deviceUntrusted: The device has been marked as untrusted
downloadLinkSent: The download link has been sent to your email
downloadPersonalDataRequirements: In order to share with you the data we store about you, please enable two factor authentication.
emailNotRegistered: There is no user registered with this email
emailSuccessfullyVerified: You have successfully verified your email address.
functionalCookiesInfo: Functional cookies allow the website to provide personalized features like displaying prices in your local currency based on your geographical location, or displaying the website in your own language if its possible.
getPushNotificationConsent: Do you allow GameDealsWeb.com to send notifications about the most important deals and news?
getPushNotificationConsentInfo: Notifications can be turned off in the browser's settings at any time.
linkAlreadyUsed: This link has already been used
name: Name
necessaryCookiesInfo: These cookies are essential to provide the basic functions of the website, for example signing in. These cannot be turned off.
newsletterInfo: Yes, i would like to receive newsletters, so i can be informed about the latest gaming deals and the site's new functions.(You can always unsubscribe from these newsletters either in your profile or by clicking the unsubscribe link in the newsletters.)
noGamesOnWaitlist: There are no games on your waitlist
noUserWithWaitlist: There is no user with waitlist
noUserSubscribedToNewsletters: There is no user subscribed to newsletters
pageTitle: Game Deals Web - The latest gaming deals
passwordForgottenInfo: Please enter your registered email address below, where we can send the verification link, that is required to create your new password.
passwordLength: The password must be at least 8 characters long
passwordResetLinkSent: The link for resetting your password has been sent to your email
privacyPolicyAcceptStart: Yes, i have read and accept the site's
privacyPolicyConsentRequired: You must accept the site's privacy policy to register.
rememberDeviceInfo: If you check this, then you won't need to enter a security code when you sign in from this device
securityAlertSent: The security alert has been sent to your email
sessionExpire: The session will expire in {{timeLeft}}. Please click on the renew button to stay logged in.
sessionIsOver: The session is over, please re-login
shouldLogin: In order to see your recommended deals, please log in.
successfullyUnsubscribed: You have successfully unsubscribed from our newsletter!
title: Title
twoFactorAppInfoStart: If you choose the app authentication method, then your authentication code will be displayed in your authentication app installed on your smartphone. The recommended application is Google Authenticator, that you can download for your
twoFactorAppInputInfo: Please enter the 6 digit verification code from your authenticator app.
twoFactorAuthenticationInfo: By enabling the two factor authentication you can increase the security of accessing your personal informations. When two factor authentication is enabled, you will also have to enter a six digit authentication code received by your choosen method, after successfully entering your login credentials
twoFactorAuthenticationSelectionInfo: Please select the method you would like to receive your six digit authentication code.
twoFactorEmailInfo: By choosing the email authentication, you will receive your authentication code to your email address.
twoFactorEmailInputInfo: Please enter the 6 digit verification code sent to your email address.
verificationCodeSent: We've sent the verification code to your email
verificationEmailInfo: If you didn't receive your verification link, please try to resend it.
verificationLinkSent: The verification link has been sent to your email

waitlistItemDeleted: The game has been successfully deleted from your waitlist
whatAreOtherTechnologiesQuestion: What kind of other technologies do we use?
whatIsACookieAnswer: A cookie is a small text file stored on your computer, that makes it possible to remember your actions you have made, by transferring it from your browser to the website's server.
whatTypeOfCookiesQuestion: What type of cookies do we use?
